channel.title: Add a direct sign-in experience for high trust scenarios :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add a sign-in experience directly with the Direct Authentication API Click here to give feedback about this page Section Notes This section contains all the Direct Auth integration guides. Each version of the original guide has been pulled into its own guide in the new IA. This was done for several reasons: It improves search results from Google It makes tagging individual guides easier and makes it easier to discover the right version of the guide in both the navbar and via internal search.

item.title: Add a passwordless sign-in with Okta Verify
item.description: Add a passwordless sign-in with Okta Verify Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 651 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Configure Direct Authentication grant types: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/configure-direct-auth-grants/coobov/main/ Page type: Task Content type: How-to with code
